channel.title: How do I stop people from Mass-clicking on my server?
channel.description:
Hi, does anyone no away to stop mass clicking? like if you click more than once in like 4 seconds, it will either kick you, or say something like "your action has been throttled" so it would just ignore the click? because people keep mass clicking and it is really annoying me.
Many Thanks

item.title: How do I stop people from Mass-clicking on my server?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

musicmad441:

[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 11:15:12 AM[/size][hr]I WILL REP++

NO talking about the flipping ++!

reported

item.title: How do I stop people from Mass-clicking on my server?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Update your process so it won’t speed up if they click rapidly … best way to do it.
